actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend the Food Security Act of 1985 to modify the exemptions from wetland conservation requirements, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Food Security Act of 1985 to exempt converted wetland from other wetland regulation if such land: (1) was converted to wetland use prior to the enactment of such Act; or (2) was farmed for at least six of the 1975 through 1985 crops and mitigated on an acre for acre basis.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Food Security Act of 1985 to modify the exemptions from wetland conservation requirements, and for other purposes.
